title: Daylight Savings Is Good For Business, The Oprah Effect 11.6.17
itunes:title: Daylight Savings Is Good For Business, The Oprah Effect 11.6.17
description:
In episode 21, Jack & Miles are joined by comedian Solomon Georgio to discuss daylight savings, the weekly tabloid watch, Trump's reactions to national tragedies, & then producer Anna Hossnieh joins to discuss Oprah's annual favorite thing list.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
